title: Model, View, Controller
content: Thoughts on MVC as a hierarchical structure for your code base? It has helped me better understand the division of responsibilities for both the function of the code as well as those working on it.

title: MySQL and Sequelize
content: I have a SQL and database background, and have found sequelize a hard syntax to grasp. It’s not intuitive for me and I’d much prefer to just code in raw SQL without needing to learn and add a layer between my code and the data. What do others think?

content: Are there more doors or wheels in the world?
